params.name: Retrieve
params.type: sequence ids from a token list that has no special tokens added. This method is called when adding

params.name: special
params.type: tokens using the tokenizer prepare_for_model method.
params.description: token_ids_0 (List[int]):List of IDs.token_ids_1 (List[int], optional):Optional second list of IDs for sequence pairs.already_has_special_tokens (bool, optional, defaults to False):Whether or not the token list is already formatted with special tokens for the model.
